        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Celestial Conduit Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly SERAPHON WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any models with this ability. In addition, add 6" to the range of any spells cast by friendly SERAPHON WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any models with this ability. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Revivifying Energies Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SERAPHON unit wholly within 12" of any models with this ability. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. Order Battletome - Seraphon

      • Skink Priest [70pts]

        Selections: Star-stone Staff, Starbolt

        Categories: HERO, SKINK, SERAPHON, ORDER, Leader, STARBORNE

        Command Abilities: Herald of the Old Ones, Unit: Skink Priest, Unit Abilities: Star-stone Staff, Weapon: Star-stone Staff, Starbolt


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Herald of the Old Ones You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKINK unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Skink Priest 8"465+ Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Star-stone Staff In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SKINK unit wholly within 12" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, until your next hero phase, that unit can run and still shoot and/or charge in the same turn, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase.

      • Skink Starpriest [120pts]

        Selections: 2. Hand of Glory, Serpent Staff, Venombolt

        Magic: Skink Starpriest (Magic), Spell: Arcane Bolt, Blazing Starlight, Hand of Glory, Mystic Shield, Unit: Skink Starpriest, Unit Abilities: Astral Herald, Serpent Staff, Weapon: Serpent Staff, Venombolt


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Skink Starpriest (Magic) 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Blazing Starlight Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Blazing Starlight 6If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Hand of Glory 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.

        Astral Herald At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice for this model. On a 5+, you receive 1 command point. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Serpent Staff In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SEARPHON unit wholly within 12" of this model. If you do so, until your next hero phase, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon

      • Slann Starmaster [260pts]

        Selections: 4. Itxi Grubs, 5. Stellar Tempest, Azure Lightning

        Categories: ORDER, SERAPHON, SLANN, STARMASTER, WIZARD, HERO, Leader, STARBORNE

        Artefact: Itxi Grubs, Command Abilities: Gift from the Heavens, Magic: Slann Starmaster (Magic), Spell: Arcane Bolt, Comet's Call, Mystic Shield, Stellar Tempest, Unit: Slann Starmaster, Unit Abilities: Arcane Vassal, Fly, Foresight, Masters of Order, Weapon: Azure Lightning


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Itxi Grubs At the start of each hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to the bearer. In addition, in your hero phase you can re-roll 1 casting or dispelling roll for the bearer, and in the enemy hero phase you can re-roll 1 unbinding roll for the bearer. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Gift from the Heavens You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SEREPHON unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, that unit can fly and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target that unit. You can only use this command ability once per hero phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Slann Starmaster (Magic) 3/3Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Comet's Call Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Comet's Call 7If successfully cast, you can pick up to D3 different enemy units anywhere on the battlefield. Each of those units suffers D3 mortal wounds (roll separately for each). If the casting roll was 10+, pick up to D6 different enemy units instead of up to D3. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Stellar Tempest 8If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Roll 1 dice for each model in that unit. For each 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slann Starmaster 5"794+ Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcane Vassal When this model attempts to cast a spell, before making the casting roll, you can pick either 1 friendly SKINK WIZARD that is within 12" of this model or 1 friendly ORACLE anywhere on the battlefield. If you do so and the spell is successfully cast and not unbound, you must measure the range and visibility for the spell from that SKINK WIZARD or ORACLE. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Foresight At the start of your hero phase, roll 2 dice for this model. For each 4+, you receive 1 command point. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Masters of Order Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model. In addition, this model can attempt to unbind enemy spells that are cast anywhere on the battlefield and attempt to dispel endless spells anywhere on the battlefield. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Azure Lightning Melee3"64+3+-11 Order Battletome - Seraphon

          • Starborne

            Selections: Show Celestial Conjuration Table

            Categories: STARBORNE

            Battle Trait: Celestial Conjuration, Lords of Space and Time, Unfeeling, Starborne Summoned Unit: 00) 1 Dread Saurian, 01) 1 Engine of the Gods, 02) 1 Stegadon with Skink Chief, 03) 1 Saurus Oldblood on Carnosaur, 04) 1 Skink Oracle on Troglodon, 05) 1 Stegadon, 06) 1 Bastilladon, 07) 1 Saurus Scar-veteran on Carnosaur, 08) 20 Saurus Warriors, 09) 3 Kroxigor, 10) 1 Saurus Astrolith Bearer, 11) 1 Saurus Sunblood, 12) 1 Skink Starpriest, 13) 1 Skink Starseer, 14) 5 Chameleon Skinks, 15) 1 Razordon Hunting Pack, 16) 1 Ripperdactyl Chief, 17) 3 Ripperdactyl Riders, 18) 1 Salamander Hunting Pack, 19) 1 Saurus Eternity Warden, 20) 5 Saurus Guard, 21) 5 Saurus Knights, 22) 1 Saurus Oldblood, 23) 1 Saurus Scar-veteran on Cold One, 24) 10 Saurus Warriors, 25) 1 Skink Priest, 26) 1 Terradon Chief, 27) 3 Terradon Riders, 28) 10 Skinks


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Celestial Conjuration You can summon STARBORNE units to the battlefield if you collect enough celestian conjuration points (CCPs). At the start of your hero phase you receive D3 celestial conjuration points if your general is a SLANN or STARSEER and is on the battlefield, and D3 celestial conjuration points if there are one or more friendly SAURUS ASTROTLITH BEARERS on the battlefield.

        In addition, in your hero phase, before attempting to cast the first spell with each friendly SLANN or ORACLE, you can say that it will carry out a celestial conjuration. If you do so, you receive D3 celestial conjuration points but the number of spells which that model can attempt to cast in that phase is reduced by 1.

        If you have 6 or more celestial conjuration points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon 1 or more units from the list to the battlefield and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of celestial conjuration points as shown on the list and you can only summon a unit if you have enough celestial conjuration points to pay its cost.

        Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12” of a friendly SLANN, friendly ORACLE, or friendly SAURUS ASTROLITH BEARER and more than 9” from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of celestial conjuration points you have immediately after the summoned unit has been set up. Summoned units have the STARBORNE keyword.        		 Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Contemplation of the Ancient Ones At the end of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SLANN and replace the spell they know from the Lore of Celestial Dominion table with a new spell from that table. Choose or roll for the new spell, rolling again if you generate the spell the SLANN already had. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Lords of Space and Time At the end of your movement phase, you can pick 1 friendly STARBORNE unit anywhere on the battlefield to be transported through space and time.

        If you do so, remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up on the battlefield anywhere that is more than 9" from any enemy unit.        		 Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Secret Asterisms At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 of the following asterisms to be in ascendance until your next hero phase: The Great Drake, The Hunter's Steed, or The Sage's Staff. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unfeeling STARBORNE units have a Bravery characteristic of 10 instead of the Bravery characteristic on their warscroll. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Secret Asterisms Effect Ref
        The Great Drake In the combat phase, pick a friendly SERAPHON HERO. Until the end of that phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by the HERO. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        The Hunter's Steed Add 1 to run and charge rolls for friendly SERAPHON units. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        The Sage's Staff At the start of the hero phase, pick 1 friendly SERAPHON WIZARD. You can add 1 to casting and dispelling rolls for that WIZARD if it is your hero phase, and you can add 1 to unbinding rolls for the WIZARD if it is the enemy hero phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Starborne Summoned Unit CCP Cost Ref
